text: Armando Herrera (5 February 1936 - 14 October 2020) was a Mexican basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. He was born in Chihuahua City, Mexico. Herrera died on 14 October 2020 at the age of 84.Luto en el basquetbol mexicano por muerte de “Chaparro” Herrera ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Mexico Category:Mexican basketball players Category:People from Chihuahua (state)
title: Armando Herrera (basketball)
